admin.description: The name of the government entity legally responsible for spending the budgeted amount.

adminID.description: The internal code for the administrative entity.

adminOrgID.description: The IATI organization identifier for the government entity legally responsible for spending the budgeted amount.

amount.description: The amount of money associated with this budget item.

amountAdjusted.description: The monetary amount allocated for expenditure for this transaction, after adjustments.

amountBudgeted.description: The monetary amount initially budgeted for this transaction.

budgetLineItem.description: The budget line item authorizing the expenditure.

code.description: Internal identifier used by data publisher for budget / revenue item.

cofog.description: The COFOG functional classification for the budget item.

contractID.description: The contract ID associated with the transaction.

date.description: The date on which the transaction took place.

dateAdjusted.description: The date on which the amount budgeted for the transaction was adjusted to the allocated amount.

dateBudgeted.description: The date on which the initial budget plan authorizing the transaction was made.

dateReported.description: The date on which the transaction was reported to the publishing body.

description.description: Human-readable description of budget / revenue item.

economic.description: Human-readable name of the economic classification of the budget item (i.e. the type of expenditure, e.g. purchases of goods, personnel expenses, etc.), drawn from the publisher's chart of accounts.

economicID.description: The internal code identifier for the economic classification

financialSource.description: Classification of the means of financing the expenditure (to distinguish those financed by loans, grants, aid, etc. from those drawn from a general fund).

functional.description: Human-readable name of the (non-COFOG) functional classification of the budget item (i.e. the socioeconomic objective or policy goal of the spending; e.g. "secondary education"), drawn from the publisher's chart of account.

functionalID.description: The internal code identifier for the functional classification.

fund.description: The fund from which the budget item will be drawn. (This refers to a named revenue stream.)

fundID.description: The internal code identifier for the fund.

geocode.description: Name of the geographical region targeted by the budget item.

gfsmExpense.description: The GFSM 2001 economic classification for the budget item.

gfsmRevenue.description: The GFSM 2001 economic classification of revenues for the revenue item.

id.description: A globally unique identifier for the budget item.

invoiceID.description: The invoice number given by the vendor or supplier.

program.description: Name of the government program underwriting the transaction. A program is a set of goal-oriented activities that has been reified by the government and made the responsibility of some ministry.

programID.description: The internal code identifier for the government program.

project.description: Name of the project underwriting the transaction. A project is an indivisible activity with a dedicated budget and fixed schedule.

projectID.description: The internal code identifier for the project.

purchaserID.description: The government entity acting as purchaser for the transaction, if different from the institution controlling the project.

purchaserOrgID.description: The IATI organization identifier for the government entity acting as purchaser for the transaction.

supplier.description: The name of the recipient of the expenditure.

type.description: Budgetary classification of item. Valid values: "personnel", "non-personnel recurrent", "capital", "other".
